reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Comprehensive Review of the Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner
reviews.reviewText: Introduction:The Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggages in black are a popular choice for travelers seeking a durable and functional carry-on option. This review aims to provide a comprehensive and unbiased assessment of this luggage, highlighting its strengths and weaknesses to help potential buyers make an informed decision.Design and Durability:The black hardside exterior of the Travelers Club Chicago luggage exudes a sleek and professional appearance. The construction appears solid and well-built, utilizing ABS materials known for their resistance to impacts and scratches. The spinner wheels allow for smooth maneuverability, making it easy to navigate through crowded airports or busy streets. However, it's important to note that some users have reported minor issues with the wheels' durability over extended periods of use.Size and Capacity:With a 20" carry-on size, the Travelers Club Chicago luggage adheres to most airline regulations and provides ample space for shorter trips or overnight stays. The expandable feature offers extra packing capacity when needed, allowing travelers to fit in additional belongings. The interior compartment is well-designed and includes organizational features such as zippered pockets and compression straps to keep items secure during transit.Handling and Maneuverability:The four 360-degree spinner wheels provide excellent maneuverability, allowing users to effortlessly glide the luggage in any direction. The retractable handle extends and retracts smoothly, providing a comfortable grip. However, it's worth mentioning that some users have reported occasional wobbling of the handle when fully extended, which may cause slight inconvenience during use.Security Features:The Travelers Club Chicago luggage includes a TSA-approved combination lock, providing an added layer of security for travelers. This feature allows airport security personnel to open and inspect the luggage without damaging the lock. Users appreciate the peace of mind that comes with having a lock integrated into the luggage, although some have experienced minor issues with the lock mechanism.Weight and Portability:Despite its durable construction, the Travelers Club Chicago luggage remains relatively lightweight, making it easier to lift and carry when necessary. The compact size and manageable weight contribute to its overall portability, ensuring that it doesn't become a burden during travels.Price and Value for Money:The Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggage offers good value for its price. It provides a balance between durability, functionality, and affordability, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious travelers. While it may not possess the premium features found in higher-end brands, it delivers on its promises and offers a reliable travel companion at a reasonable price point.Conclusion:The Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggages, Black, 20" Carry-On offer a sturdy and practical travel solution for individuals in need of a reliable carry-on suitcase. Its durable construction, expandable capacity, and smooth maneuverability make it well-suited for short trips or overnight stays. While it may not be without its minor flaws, such as occasional issues with the wheels or handle wobbling, it remains a solid choice in terms of value for money. Ultimately, the decision to purchase this luggage will depend on personal preferences and priorities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this travel, check on luggage for my Grand Daughter for visits back and forth to her friends. It came on time and was undamaged. The color is very pretty and the size is perfect for overnight or the weekend. The suitcase can extend for more items. The rollers are great! Moves very easily and I wish they had these when I was younger and traveling! Convenient size and good material that keeps its shape and look. The handle comes out smoothly and easily. The zippers all work very well with no snags. Very happy with this suitcase and recommend it for others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this carry-on for my son, who is a college freshman, to use as he flies back and forth home from school. It is sturdy, light weight, and easy to roll. The bright color makes it easy for him to quickly distinguish from others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for non frequent traveling
reviews.reviewText: luggage is nice and spacious, but I've taken it on 3 trips and its starting to show wear on the stitching, and the handle is hard to click in and out of the suitcase.good for once a year trips, but not for frequent travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price! This was the cheapest bag I could find in the carryon size. Wheels around great, lightweight and I love the color. The expandability is an added bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the whole family
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set and it's perfect for my two kids and I. Everyone gets their own bag all of the toiletries and bathroom stuff get put in the same bag. It has made traveling so much easier. They all roll and have handles so everyone is able to carry their own bag. They have been very durable and I've gone through lots and lots of trips with no issues at all. I absolutely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it…
reviews.reviewText: Packed it to the fullest and even after the airline crew passed it and threw it around? It held up. It expands and fits perfect in carry on areas. Even after the airline carrier made me check it because people don’t know what Carry on means and there ends up being no room? It was ok when returned to me. I love the color and feel. It rolls well and I’m 6 ft tall. It feels lightweight when full too. I like it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little flimsy but cute
reviews.reviewText: I love that this comes with the two little bags because it's the only place to put your smaller items like toiletries, medication, chargers, etc. The suitcase is the perfect size for a weekend trip. Very cute. I love the teal color. The only real con is that the handle to pull it is flimsy and feels like it could break at any time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggages
reviews.reviewText: good product well made, it easily compare with other brand that are twice the price
Light but sturdy. I hope not too many people buy it because the colour should make it easy to find this suitcase on any luggage carousel. The wheels are smooth. Good purchase.
It holds an amazing amount of clothes. Highly recommend for appearance and sturdiness
